title: Low fps with good pc.
body: So I have some problem with my fps in game. The fps tends to be around 100 while nothing is happening but then when a team fight occurs, the fps drops down to like 50. Make it unplayable. I have a really good gaming pc so I am not sure why I dont have that high of an fps.

replies.body: Have you checked for any possible driver updates for your graphics card that might help? I'd also consider running through the other steps listed in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as some basic troubleshooting, but let our tech guys know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if that doesn't seem to help.

Can you guys stop with those generic answers "update drivers, check fps guide etc..." just stop lol, we all know its after this patch and that before was good, also 99% of people already know how to update their drivers tho.

It's not that I'm trying to brush you off, but it's just smart to cover the basics and get that out of the way first. Wouldn't feel too good to do hours of troubleshooting only to realize it was a simple missed driver =\ . If the patch were the main cause, then it would affect 100% of the playerbase and not just a select few. 

Let me know what all you've done, and we can definitely skip those steps though. You always have the option of reaching out to our actual techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they can look through your log files to get a better idea of what's going wrong.
made a ticket with logs. hoping for a solution. thanks.

It is the 7.22 Patch.
Many people got this Lag Spikes.
When get it fixed? 

It is since patch, all Drivers updated, i can play all other games that i play on high settings :)
So it is this patch.

Same since the Patch it is laggy af.
Before patch constant 200 fps.
But after Patch xD:
In late game 60 fps and drops to 40. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
